tool.name: Scanpy Harmony
tool.description: adjust principal components for variables that might introduce batch effect
tool.command: #if $batch_key ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-cli integrate harmony --batch-key '${batch_key}' #if $basis --basis '${basis}' #end if --adjusted-basis '${adjusted_basis}' #if not $settings.default #if $settings.theta --theta '${settings.theta}' #end if #if $settings.lambda --lambda '${settings.lambda}' #end if #if $settings.sigma --sigma '${settings.sigma}' #end if #if $settings.nclust --nclust '${settings.nclust}' #end if #if $settings.tau --tau '${settings.tau}' #end if #if $settings.block_size --block-size '${settings.block_size}' #end if #if $settings.max_iter_cluster --max-iter-cluster '${settings.max_iter_cluster}' #end if #if $settings.max_iter_harmony --max-iter-harmony '${settings.max_iter_harmony}' #end if #if $settings.epsilon_cluster --epsilon-cluster '${settings.epsilon_cluster}' #end if #if $settings.epsilon_harmony --epsilon-harmony '${settings.epsilon_harmony}' #end if #if $settings.random_state --random-state '${settings.random_state}' #end if #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@ #else echo "No batch variables passed, simply passing original input as output unchanged." && cp '${input_obj_file}' output.h5 #end if

param.name: batch_key
param.label: The name of the column in adata.obs that differentiates among experiments/batches.

param.name: basis
param.label: The name of the field in adata.obsm where the PCA table is stored. Defaults to 'X_pca', which is the default for sc.tl.pca().

param.name: adjusted_basis
param.label: he name of the field in adata.obsm where the adjusted PCA table will be stored after running this function.

param.name: theta
param.label: Diversity clustering penalty parameter
param.help: theta=0 does not encourage any diversity. Larger values of theta result in more diverse clusters.

param.name: lambda
param.label: Ridge regression penalty parameter
param.help: Lambda must be strictly positive. Smaller values result in more aggressive correction.

param.name: sigma
param.label: Ridge regression penalty parameter
param.help: Width of soft kmeans clusters. Sigma scales the distance from a cell to cluster centroids. Larger values of sigma result in cells assigned to more clusters. Smaller values of sigma make soft kmeans cluster approach hard clustering.

param.name: nclust
param.label: Number of clusters in model.
param.help: nclust=1 equivalent to simple linear regression.

param.name: tau
param.label: Protection against overclustering small datasets with large ones.
param.help: 'tau is the expected number of cells per cluster.

param.name: block_size
param.label: What proportion of cells to update during clustering
param.help: Between 0 to 1, default 0.05. Larger values may be faster but less accurate.

param.name: max_iter_cluster
param.label: Maximum number of rounds to run clustering at each round of Harmony

param.name: max_iter_harmony
param.label: Maximum number of rounds to run Harmony. One round of Harmony involves one clustering and one correction step.

param.name: epsilon_cluster
param.label: Convergence tolerance for clustering round of Harmony
param.help: Set to -Inf to never stop early.

param.name: epsilon_harmony
param.label: Convergence tolerance for Harmony.
param.help: Set to -Inf to never stop early.
